title: Week of Character, Courage & Conscience: Should I Call Their Parents?
description:
Kate worries if she should inform the parents of her teen daughter’s friends who were caught vaping and hiding alcohol. - Dr. Laura: "Be less concerned about YOU and MORE concerned about these children."

Do you worry about how you'll be perceived? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

Order Dr. Laura's book: "How Could You Do That?!: The Abdication of Character, Courage, and Conscience"

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/compare-books-and-courses-by-dr-laura
